## Importing datasets
```{r}
source("GET_VARS.R")
companies <- read.csv(here::here("data","companies.csv"))
```

```{r}
# get schedule D
schedule_d <- map_df(files, ~get_df(filename = .x , 
                              schedule = 'd')) %>%
  filter_ein() %>% 
  left_join(companies, by = as.character("EIN"))
```
